---
title: "Processing After-School Program Data from Denver Open Data"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

## Get data

```{r, message=FALSE, results="hide"}
library(tidyverse)
library(rgdal)

# Specify the data set to download (zip file name)
name <- "afterschool_programs"

# Download .zip to temporary directory, unzip, and get data.
url <- paste("https://www.denvergov.org/media/gis/DataCatalog/", name, "/shape/", name, ".zip", sep="")
tempDir <- tempdir()
file <- basename(url)
download.file(url, file)
unzip(file, exdir = tempDir)

data <- readOGR(dsn = tempDir, name)
```

## Summarize the data

Overview of entries in each column:

```{r}
summary(data)
```
